ai-vb4:1.2_0: The noble truths of suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:2.1_0: Herein, what is the noble truth of suffering?
ai-vb4:2.2_0: Rebirth is suffering; old age is suffering; death is suffering; sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress are suffering; association with the disliked is suffering; separation from the liked is suffering; not getting what you wish for is suffering. In brief, the five grasping aggregates are suffering.
ai-vb4:3.2_0: The rebirth, inception, conception, reincarnation, manifestation of the sets of phenomena, and acquisition of the sense fields of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:3.3_0: This is called one who knows.
ai-vb4:4.2_0: The old age, decrepitude, broken teeth, grey hair, wrinkly skin, diminished vitality, and failing faculties of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:5.2_0: The passing away, perishing, disintegration, demise, mortality, death, decease, breaking up of the aggregates, laying to rest of the corpse, and cutting off of the life faculty of the various sentient beings in the various orders of sentient beings.
ai-vb4:6.2_0: To one touched by misfortune regarding relatives, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress, he experiences the sorrowless state of loss of loss, sorrow, inner deep sorrow or lamentation, pain and distress.
ai-vb4:7.2_0: To one touched by relatives or family, lament, sorrowing, state of loss, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ai-vb4:8.2_0: Physical pain, physical displeasure, the painful, unpleasant feeling that’s born from physical contact.
ai-vb4:9.2_0: Mental pain, mental displeasure, the painful, unpleasant feeling that’s born from mental contact.
ai-vb4:10.2_0: To one touched by misfortune regarding relatives, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress, he who has undergone misfortune regarding his views, who has experienced suffering, and distress, and who has undergone misfortune or other.
ai-vb4:11.1_0: Herein, what is meant by ‘association with the disliked is suffering’?
ai-vb4:11.2_0: It’s when you’re unlikable, undesirable, smells, flavors, and material objects are unpleasant to him. And it’s when they don’t want, without trouble or difficulty.
ai-vb4:11.3_0: The meeting of these inclusiveness is a meeting place—
ai-vb4:11.4_0: this is said to be “with the disliked is suffering”.
ai-vb4:12.1_0: Herein, what is meant by ‘separation from the liked is suffering’?
ai-vb4:12.2_0: It’s when you’re likable, desirable, and agreeable sights, whether sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts. Your mother and father are brothers, brothers, sisters, relatives, or clan. Yours, and kin.
ai-vb4:12.3_0: and doesn’t meet humble in their culmination:
ai-vb4:13.1_0: Herein, what is ‘not getting what you wish for is suffering’?
ai-vb4:13.2_0: To those beings subject to birth, this longing arises:
ai-vb4:13.3_0: “Oh, might we not be subject to birth,
ai-vb4:13.4_0: may birth not come to us!”
ai-vb4:13.5_0: But that cannot be attained merely by longing for it:
ai-vb4:13.6_0: this is the suffering from not obtaining what one longs for.
ai-vb4:14.1_0: In sentient beings who are liable to grow old ...
ai-vb4:14.3_0: To those beings subject to death ...
ai-vb4:14.4_0: experience sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress, such a wish arises:
ai-vb4:14.5_0: “Oh, might we not be subject to grief, lamentation, pain, sorrow, and despair,
ai-vb4:14.6_0: and may grief, lamentation, pain, sorrow, and despair surely not come to us!”
ai-vb4:14.7_0: But that cannot be attained merely by longing for it:
ai-vb4:14.8_0: this is the suffering from not obtaining what one longs for.
ai-vb4:15.1_0: Herein, in brief, are the five constituents (of mind and body) that provide fuel for attachment that are suffering?
ai-vb4:15.3_0: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-vb4:15.4_0: These are called the five grasping aggregates.
ai-vb4:16.1_0: This is called the noble truth of suffering.
ai-vb4:17.1_0: Herein, what is the noble truth of the arising of suffering?
ai-vb4:17.2_0: the craving that leads to future rebirth, mixed up with relishing and greed, taking pleasure in various different realms. That is,
ai-vb4:17.3_0: craving for sensual pleasures, craving for continued existence, and craving to end existence.
ai-vb4:18.1_0: But where does that craving when it is arising arise?
ai-vb4:18.2_0: ‘That craving arises and settles on whatever in the world seems nice and pleasant.
ai-vb4:19.1_0: And what in the world seems nice and pleasant?
ai-vb4:19.2_0: The eye in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.
ai-vb4:19.7_0: mind in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.
ai-vb4:20.1_0: Sights in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.
ai-vb4:20.6_0: thoughts in the world seem nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.

ai-vb4:21.6_0: mind consciousness in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving arises and settles.

ai-vb4:29.1_0: This is called the noble truth of the origin of suffering.
ai-vb4:30.1_0: Herein, what is the noble truth of the cessation of suffering?
ai-vb4:30.2_0: It’s the fading away and cessation of that very same craving with nothing left over; giving it away, letting it go, releasing it, and not adhering to it.
ai-vb4:31.1_0: But where does that craving when it is being abandoned? When where does it cease?
ai-vb4:31.2_0: Whatever in the world seems nice and pleasant, it is there that craving is given up and ceases.
ai-vb4:32.1_0: And what in the world seems nice and pleasant?
ai-vb4:32.2_0: The eye in the world seems nice and pleasant, and it is there that craving is given up and ceases.

ai-vb4:42.1_0: This is called the noble truth of the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:43.1_0: Herein, what is the noble truth of the practice leading to the end of suffering?
ai-vb4:43.2_0: It’s just this noble eightfold path,
ai-vb4:43.3_0: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-vb4:44.2_0: knowing about suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:45.2_0: Thoughts of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness.
ai-vb4:46.2_0: The refraining from lying, divisive speech, harsh speech, and talking nonsense.
ai-vb4:46.3_0: this is said to be the right speech.
ai-vb4:47.2_0: Refraining from killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct.
ai-vb4:48.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple gives up wrong livelihood and earns a living by right livelihood.
ai-vb4:49.2_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise.
ai-vb4:49.3_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that bad, unskillful qualities that have arisen are given up, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-vb4:49.4_0: If they generate enthusiasm, try, make an effort, exert the mind, and strive so that skillful qualities arise, even for the time of a finger-snap ...
ai-vb4:49.5_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-vb4:49.6_0: this is said to be the right size.
ai-vb4:50.2_0: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-vb4:50.4_0: They meditate observing an aspect of the mind ...
ai-vb4:50.5_0: principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-vb4:51.2_0: Take a mendicant who, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-vb4:51.5_0: With the giving up of pleasure and pain, and the ending of former happiness and sadness, they enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
ai-vb4:51.6_0: this is called immersion due to mindfulness.
ai-vb4:52.1_0: This is called the noble truth of the practice going to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:54.2_0: suffering is the origin of suffering.
ai-vb4:55.1_0: Herein, what is the origin of suffering?
ai-vb4:55.3_0: This is called the origin of suffering.
ai-vb4:56.2_0: Visākha, unskillful qualities, and skillful qualities are blameworthy and skillful, blameless, but have a result of good and skillful qualities. All skillful qualities because of this, their skillful transferred to as their results, and skillful qualities.
ai-vb4:57.1_0: Herein, what is the cessation of suffering?
ai-vb4:57.3_0: This is called the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:58.1_0: Herein, what is the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering?
ai-vb4:58.2_0: It’s when a mendicant develops the supermundane absorption ...
ai-vb4:58.2_1: Firstly, at that time they enter and remain in the first absorption ...
ai-vb4:59.2_1: Investigation of principles, right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-vb4:60.2_0: The thought of good will, right thought, right speech, and right action.
ai-vb4:61.2_0: Avoiding these four kinds of bad conduct by way of body, speech, and mind, and refraining from wrong speech. ...
ai-vb4:61.3_0: this is said to be the right speech.
ai-vb4:62.2_0: And he displays the three kinds of misconduct by way of body, speech, and mind, without killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual misconduct; he uses the path to come uproot the believing.
ai-vb4:63.2_0: It’s the wrong way for one who refrains from wrong livelihood and earns a living by right livelihood. ...
ai-vb4:64.2_0: If it is the awakening factor of energy ...
ai-vb4:64.3_0: this is said to be the right size.
ai-vb4:65.2_0: The mindfulness of breathing is the awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
ai-vb4:66.2_0: It’s the awakening factor of immersion ...
ai-vb4:66.3_0: this is called immersion due to mindfulness.
ai-vb4:66.4_0: This is called the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:66.5_0: The rest are related to the practice leading to the cessation of suffering.
ai-vb4:67.1_0: Herein, what is the origin of suffering?
ai-vb4:67.2_0: Craving, the rest of craving, and the defilements—
ai-vb4:67.3_0: This is called the origin of suffering.
ai-vb4:68.2_0: Virtuous things and three unskillful things are skillful, blameworthy, not to be cultivated, and skillful qualities that are skillful and results in skillful.

ai-vb4:69.2_0: the rest of craving and corruptions:
